entry.title: Selkie
entry.content:
Selkie

She is a very kind and beautiful cat.

She loves having her chin pet and hates the vet.

entry.title: Ringo
entry.content:
Ringo

  • Full name : Ring-Tailed Lemur
  • Likes: bullying dogs
  • Dislikes: waiting for the food dispenser

entry.title: Bashti
entry.content:
Bashti

She is one of the smallest cats I've ever met with the shortest tail

Likes sleeping on people, does not like loud noises.
entry.summary: She is one of the smallest cats I've ever met with the shortest tail

entry.title: Slug
entry.content:
Slug

He is so tiny and silly and sweet.

Likes sleeping on random people, does not link things that are too tall for him to climb.
entry.summary: He is so tiny and silly and sweet.

entry.title: Spriggan
entry.content:
Spriggan

He is very loud and anxious.

Loves reassurance and head pets. Hates people he doesn't know
